posts.author: Ernest Hemingway
posts.title: The Old Man and the Sea
posts.description: The Old Man and the Sea is a novella written by the American author Ernest Hemingway in 1951 in Cayo Blanco (Cuba), and published in 1952.

posts.author: Oscar Wilde
posts.title: The Picture of Dorian Gray
posts.description: "Dorian Gray" redirects here. For the character, see Dorian Gray (character). For other uses, see Dorian Gray (disambiguation) and The Picture of Dorian Gray (disambiguation).

posts.author: Mikhail Bulgakov
posts.title: The Master and Margarita
posts.description: The Master and Margarita (Russian: Мастер и Маргарита) is a novel by Soviet writer Mikhail Bulgakov, written in the Soviet Union between 1928 and 1940 during Stalin's regime.
